results.title: Crypto PACs secure massive war chests ahead of US midterms
results.description: Crypto super PACs are getting millions of dollars in contributions to spend supporting candidates who will advance their policies in Washington.

results.title: Bitcoin Core dev Gloria Zhao quits maintainer role after six-year stint
results.description: Bitcoin Core maintainer Gloria Zhao has stepped down and revoked her PGP signing key after six years as one of the project’s most influential mempool and policy engineers.

results.title: Official Trump Meme Coin, WLFI Lead Losses Following World Liberty Financial Probe
results.description: Trump-linked tokens have fallen on news of an investigation into World Liberty Financial’s dealings with a member of the UAE royal family.

results.title: Why privacy coins often appear in post-hack fund flows
results.description: Privacy coins often appear after hacks, but they are only one link in a longer laundering chain that includes swaps, bridges and off-ramps.

results.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
results.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

results.title: Morning Minute: Bitcoin Erases Trump Pump, Falls to $60k
results.description: Thursday marked one of the worst days in crypto history, with majors plunging 15-20% before modest relief.

results.title: Trend Research dumps over 400K ETH as liquidation risk rises
results.description: Trend Research has been reducing its Ether exposure, as ETH price closed in on some of the investment company's critical liquidation levels below $1,700.

results.title: Bitcoin price rebounds 11% to $65K: Who is buying the dip?
results.description: Over $2.6 billion was wiped out across the crypto market as institutions saw sub-$60,000 BTC as a buy-the-dip opportunity.

results.title: NFT market cap slides back to 2021 pre-hype levels, near $1.5B
results.description: NFT minting expanded in 2025 even as sales fell sharply, leaving more tokens chasing fewer buyers.

results.title: Cathie Wood’s ARK dumps $17M in Coinbase stock as shares fall 37% YTD
results.description: ARK Invest sold $17.4 million in Coinbase while buying $17.8 million of Bullish shares, signaling a major shift in strategy as crypto markets stumble.

results.title: Polymarket Files for Crypto Token Trademarks as Legal Battles Mount
results.description: The prediction market has filed trademark applications for POLY and $POLY tied to a digital token and crypto trading services.

results.title: Pump.fun moves deeper into trading infrastructure with Vyper acquisition
results.description: The deal adds analytics and execution tools to Pump.fun’s ecosystem as Vyper winds down its standalone product and migrates users to Terminal.

results.title: Bitcoin sees record $10K drop as model says  $93.5K may only return in 2028
results.description: Bitcoin fell by more than $10,000 in a single day for the first time, with BTC price bear market analysis warning that a rebound could take several years.

results.title: Crypto Advocates Round on Democrats’ ‘Crypto Crash’ Message
results.description: Industry leaders condemned a Democratic Party social media post mocking crypto market losses amid billions of dollars in liquidations.

results.title: Crypto Sentiment Sinks to Lowest Level in 3.5 Years
results.description: Investor fear in crypto has sunk to levels last seen during the year of Terra's collapse as macro pressures intensify.

results.title: Senator Lummis Urges Banks to 'Embrace' Stablecoins Amid CLARITY Act Stalemate
results.description: The Wyoming Senator said stablecoins give banks an "entirely new financial product" as the crypto market structure bill faces a delay.

results.title: Bitcoin Miners IREN and CleanSpark Slide After Earnings Misses Deepen Sector Pressure
results.description: Shares fell after both companies reported quarterly revenue below Wall Street expectations as Bitcoin dropped sharply.

results.title: Does Bitcoin's Retreat Signal a New Bear Market for Crypto?
results.description: A single-day 14% drop and a drawdown of more than 50% have pushed Bitcoin into territory typically associated with bear markets.

results.title: OpenAI and Anthropic Roll Out Rival AI Models as Competition for Enterprise Heats Up
results.description: OpenAI and Anthropic released new flagship AI models within hours of each other on Thursday, with benchmark results suggesting they're optimized for different strengths.

results.title: Waymo’s ‘Self-Driving’ Claims Called into Question on Capitol Hill
results.description: Senators pressed Waymo over its use of human operators in the Philippines, questioning whether autonomy still means what Waymo says it does.
